column2: Since our inception in 1978, we have sought to have long-term relationships with our customers. Thus, we do not wish to profit from the unwanted distribution of your private information or to inundate you with unnecessary e-mails or other material.
lease use the following contact information: support@zacks.com.

Since our inception in 1978, we have sought to have long-term relationships with our customers. Thus, we do not wish to profit from the unwanted distribution of your private information or to inundate you with unnecessary e-mails or other material.
Our goal is for the e-mails to be of value to you.
calling us at 1-800-767-3771 ext. 9339 or emailing your request to support@zacks.com.

This process usually completes within 72 hours but can take up to 10 days in rare situations. However, if you later register for a Zacks product again, your name will be removed from the Do Not Email list.
How that mailer manages your email address after that time is beyond Zacks.com control.
Contact Information: If you experience any privacy related difficulties on Zacks.com, please use the following contact information: support@zacks.com.
